header.head: Gibby savings app
header.first-sub-head: Get paid for saving your money.
header.second-sub-head: Invest with Gibby, begin a new savings Journey or continue growing a previous Goal.

sub-body-1.head: Save for a purpose
sub-body-1.body: Specify a purpose for saving and monitor the progress

sub-body-2.head: Flexible saving options
sub-body-2.body: Save with ease, from the comfort of your home with full money safety assurance

sub-body-3.head: Fixed Deposit
sub-body-3.body: Specify a duration for how long you want to save the money and gibby locks it away from your access
